mapper.select: select * from product order by pd_num
select * from member order by id
select count(id) from member
select count(id) from member where inputdate >= to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and inputdate <= to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select comments.id ,count(*) count from comments join commentReport on comments.com_num = commentreport.com_num group by comments.id order by count(*) desc
select review.id id ,count(*) count from review_report join review on review.review_num = review_report.review_num group by review.id order by count(*) desc

select commentReport.id ,comments.com_content, comments.COM_NUM ,commentReport.REP_DISCRIPTION, commentReport.reasons from comments join commentReport on comments.com_num = commentreport.com_num where comments.id=#{id}

select review_report.id ,review.review,review.review_num ,review_report.report_content, review_report.report_reason from review join review_report on review.review_num = review_report.review_num where review.id=#{id}

select board.bod_num, title, servings, time, category, tags, id, bod_image , rec from board full outer join (select count(*)as rec , bod_num from recommend group by bod_num) sel on sel.bod_num = board.bod_num order by bod_num
select * from ingredient order by ing_num desc
select * from ingredient where ing_num = #{ingnum}
select count(ing_num) from ingredient where ing_name = #{ingname}
select count(ref_num) from refrigerator where ing_num = #{ingnum}
select count(ord_num) from orders where ord_date >= to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and ord_date <= to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select sum(ord_totalpay) from orders where ord_date >= to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and ord_date <= to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select rownum as ranknum, ord_pdname, sellnum from ( select ord_pdname, count(ord_num) as sellnum from orders group by ord_pdname order by count(ord_num) desc ) where rownum <= 5
select * from orders order by ord_date desc
select odt.odt_ordnum,p.pd_name, p.pd_image,p.pd_price,odt.odt_qty from orderdetail odt full outer join product p on odt.odt_pdnum = p.pd_num where odt_ordnum = #{odtordnum}
mapper.update: update orders set ord_paystate = #{ordtel} where ord_num = #{ordnum}
